title: Glitch Energy Scope Capture (Falling Edge, 1 LSB Step)
summary: Oscilloscope capture of glitch response on a falling-edge 1 LSB code transition with LDAC clock feed-through.

structured_data.description: Figure title indicates 5 V, 12-bit, 1 LSB step, falling edge; annotated with VOUT 500 uV/div, trigger pulse 5 V/div, time base 2 us/div, transition 801h to 800h.
